messages.subject: "Lost," Chapter 1 -- Sai/Mis AU Lemon
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, everyone! I ve just posted chapter one of a new fic, Lost: http://adultfan.nexcess.net/aff/story.php?no=38352 A little bit angstier than I usually go,
messages.messageBody:
Hi, everyone!

I've just posted chapter one of a new fic, "Lost:"

http://adultfan.nexcess.net/aff/story.php?no=38352

A little bit angstier than I usually go, but it will definitely be lemony as
the story develops. I'm always trying to improve my writing, so comments
and suggestions appreciated -- let me know what you think!

Kalli
